channel.title: Weird shit
channel.description:
I was on my server then it dced. Try to log on again and says your already logged in. I restarted the server and it nulled. I restarted again and it was fine but i get this in the run cmd:
[code]ler.java:201) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:174) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.util.SQL.destroyConnection(SQL.java:42) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.util.SQL.query(SQL.java:33) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.util.SQL.saveHighScores(SQL.java:53) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.initialize(Client.java:55 2) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:201) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:174) [7/22/11 9:34 AM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Comm unications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,311,352,443,709 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. Ik this bit means my IP has been black listed by my webhost so they are blocking remote mySQL connections.
[code]The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,311,352,446,006 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago.[/code]
I haven't got a clue about the rest. Could this whole error be caused by my IP being black listed?

item.title: Weird shit
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

I was on my server then it dced. Try to log on again and says your already logged in. I restarted the server and it nulled. I restarted again and it was fine but i get this in the run cmd:
